snippet.title: Slow football, like the kind mom made: A guide on messaging, for next time
snippet.description:
Slow football, like the kind mom made: A guide on messaging, for next time by Spencer Hall on Mar 6 2014, 1:53p
The NCAA Rules Committee's proposed speed limit on hurry-up offenses isn't done for. It'll be back on the table next year, but without needing to lie about being a safety rule. So how will...

snippet.title: 2014 college basketball power rankings: Florida No. 1, Wichita State No. 2 in Savory Sixteen
snippet.description:
2014 college basketball power rankings: Florida No. 1, Wichita State No. 2 in Savory Sixteen by Andy Hutchins on Feb 24 2014, 11:37a
Florida keeps its top spot, Wichita State moves up, a bunch of teams deserve No. 3 and No. 7, and the surprise inclusion of the week is a team that wears baby blue.

snippet.title: The value of late second-round picks
snippet.description:
The value of late second-round picks by Mark Deeks on Oct 25 2013, 2:14p
